title: DJ Khaled, Meg Thee Stallion, Da Baby, Lil Baby & Lil Durk Perform Medley Of Hits | BET Awards
author: BETNetworks
description:
DJ Khaled is joined by Megan Thee Stallion, Lil Baby, Da Baby, Lil Durk, and H.E.R. for performances of “Hats Off,” “I Did It,” and “Every Chance I Get” at the 2021 BET Awards. #CulturesBiggestNight #BETAwards

localize.description:
